mapper.select: SELECT id, applicant_id, email, title, content, sender_id, sended_at FROM mail;
SELECT id, applicant_id, email, title, content, sender_id, sended_at FROM mail WHERE id = #{id};
SELECT id, applicant_id, email, title, content, sender_id, sended_at FROM mail WHERE email = #{email}

SELECT application.id as id, application.recruitment_id as recruitment_id, recruitment.title as recruitment_title, application.applicant_id as applicant_id, applicant.name as applicant_name, applicant.email as email, application_job_test.id as applicationJobTestId, application_job_test.started_at FROM application JOIN recruitment ON application.recruitment_id = recruitment.id JOIN applicant ON application.applicant_id = applicant.id JOIN application_job_test ON application.id = application.id = application_job_test.application_id JOIN job_test ON application_job_test.job_test_id = job_test.id JOIN job_test_question ON job_test.id = job_test_question.job_test_id WHERE application.id = #{id};

SELECT application.id as id, application.recruitment_id as recruitment_id, recruitment.title as recruitment_title, application.applicant_id as applicant_id, applicant.name as applicant_name, application.interview_id as interview_id, interview.datetime as interview_datetime, interview.address as interview_address FROM application JOIN recruitment ON application.recruitment_id = recruitment.id JOIN applicant ON application.applicant_id = applicant.id JOIN interview ON application.interview_id = interview.id WHERE application.id = #{id};
